description:
While his friends work to free the captain of the Straw Hats, cowardly Usopp finds himself in a position to shed his yellow streak and make his father proud.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hokoritakaki Senshi! Gekitou Sanji to Usopp
Les glorieux guerriers ! Les combats acharnés de Sanji et Usopp !
Proud Warriors! Sanji and Usopp`s Fierce Battles!
Благородные воины! Отчаянные поединки Санджи и Усоппа
محاربون فخورون! معركتا سانجي وأوسوبّ الحاميتان
การต่อสู้ของผู้กล้า! ซันจิและอุซป!
誇り高き戦士! 激闘サンジとウソップ
